metadata.Title: CVE-2017-13167 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
An elevation of privilege vulnerability in the kernel sound timer. Product:Android. Versions: Android kernel. Android ID A-37240993.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-13167` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-7.22
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-7.22
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-lowlatency - 4.4.0-7.22
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1003-raspi2 - 4.4.0-1003.4
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1012-snapdragon - 4.4.0-1012.12
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1129-aws - 4.4.0-1001.10
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-143-generic - 4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-143-generic - 4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-143-lowlatency - 4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1003-gke - 4.4.0-1003.3
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-1003-gke - 4.4.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1114-azure - 4.11.0-1009.9
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1099-gcp - 4.10.0-1004.4
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1094-kvm - 4.4.0-1004.9
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-9019-euclid - 4.4.0-9019.20
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-9019-euclid - 4.4.0-9019.20
No subscription required

linux-image-4.13.0-1008-oem - 4.13.0-1008.9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in esm-infra/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-7.22').
linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
